thread.title: Denise Broadwell
thread.title_full: Traffic School 4 Busy People reviewed by Denise Broadwell

author: Denise Broadwell
title: Denise Broadwell
text: I took the test , it was like doing a driving course test, but It was also like a review of everything I already know. It was an open book test so you can pass it. It was thorough, educating and took about a lil more then a hour. I started and stopped when I needed , no pressure. I was happy that I passed and now when when I drive I am more aware of things that I need be. It was affordable compared to other tests offered .
